Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers

Class IslandManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers.Manager
it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers.IslandManager
public class IslandManager extends Manager
Class that contains all the methods that change the status of the islandTiles.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • unifyPossibleIslands

      public void unifyPossibleIslands() throws TableNotSetException
      Checks in the IslandTile groups if there are islands with consecutive id (consecutive groups) with the same tower color on it. If so, join the groups together. If in both the groups I have NoEntry tiles, I will set the available NoEntry tiles back to 1 If only one group has the NoEntry tile, it will be extended to all the new merged islands
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if the Table is not set in the GameEngine

    • getMotherNatureIslandId

      public int getMotherNatureIslandId() throws TableNotSetException
      Returns the id of the Island where there's MotherNature.
      Returns:
      MotherNature's IslandTile id
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine

    • islandTileHasNoEntry

      public boolean islandTileHasNoEntry(int islandId) throws TableNotSetException
      Returns true if IslandTile whose id is islandId has the NoEntry tile.
      Parameters:
      islandId - the id of the island to search
      Returns:
      true if NoEntry tile is present
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine

    • setIslandGroupNoEntryByIslandId

      public void setIslandGroupNoEntryByIslandId(int islandId, boolean value) throws TableNotSetException
      Sets noEntry value for the group of IslandTiles where there's and Island whose id is the same of islandId.
      Parameters:
      islandId - the id of the island to search
      value - new value for NoEntry in the IslandTile
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine

    • getIslandGroupsNumber

      public int getIslandGroupsNumber() throws TableNotSetException
      Returns the number of IslandTile groups.
      Returns:
      the number of IslandTile groups
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine

    • getIslandTowerColor

      public TowerColor getIslandTowerColor(int islandId) throws TableNotSetException, TowerNotSetException
      Gets the color of the IslandTile with islandId.
      Parameters:
      islandId - the id of the IslandTile to search
      Returns:
      the color of the Tower on the IslandTile
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine
      TowerNotSetException - if there isn't a tower on the IslandTile (check with islandTileHasTower(int))

    • islandTileHasTower

      public boolean islandTileHasTower(int islandId) throws TableNotSetException
      Returns true if there's a Tower on the IslandTile.
      Parameters:
      islandId - the id of the IslandTile to search
      Returns:
      true if there's a Tower on the IslandTile
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine

    • getAvailableIslandTilesForMotherNature

      public ArrayList<Integer> getAvailableIslandTilesForMotherNature(int playerId) throws AssistantCardNotSetException, TableNotSetException
      Returns an ArrayList of IslandTiles id where MotherNature can be placed by the Player whose id is playerId.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the id of the Player that wants to move MotherNature
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of IslandTiles id where MotherNature can be placed
      Throws:
      AssistantCardNotSetException - if the Player whose id is playerId hasn't an AssistantCard in hand which determines the MotherNature movements number.
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine

    • moveTowerFromPlayerSchoolBoardToIsland

      public void moveTowerFromPlayerSchoolBoardToIsland(int playerId, int islandId) throws NoSuchElementException, TowerNotSetException, TableNotSetException, TowerAlreadySetException
      Moves a Tower to an IslandTile. Gets the Tower from the Team where playerId belongs. Then it reaches the destination IslandTile (using islandId) to place the Tower: if there isn't already any tower, sets it; else grabs the old tower and adds it to the Team where the Tower belongs and places the new Tower.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the id of the Player whose Team moves the Tower on the IslandTile
      islandId - the id of the destination IslandTile from the Tower
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if requested Player o Island could not be found
      TowerNotSetException - if the Team where the Player belongs hasn't Towers to move
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine
      TowerAlreadySetException - if there's already a Tower with the color of the Tower to move on that IslandTile

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int playerId, int islandId) throws IllegalArgumentException, AssistantCardNotSetException, TableNotSetException
      Moves MotherNature safely to the requested IslandTile (safely because I check if the Player who asked it has enough movements - defined by AssistantCard - to place MotherNature there).
      Parameters:
      playerId - the id of the Player that asked to move MotherNature
      islandId - the id of the IslandTile where MotherNature has to be placed
      Throws:
      AssistantCardNotSetException - if the Player whose id is playerId hasn't an AssistantCard in hand which determines the MotherNature movements number.
      TableNotSetException - if Table is not set in GameEngine
      IllegalArgumentException - if MotherNature can't reach the requested IslandTile
